title: Ep 424 | Shocking Practices at the Temple of Aphrodite & Dodging Theological Mudholes
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al are extremely excited to sit down and discuss Jesus with guest Larry Bowles from Athens, Greece. Larry reveals contextual meanings in scripture often overlooked by churches unfamiliar with the practices of ancient Corinth. Al interviews Larry about how God used him to minister to refugees, and Larry teaches about the temple of Aphrodite and the shocking practices that took place inside. Larry explains how to avoid misunderstanding scripture by using historical context to find relevance in texts.
